data.actual_result: The homepage for discordapp shows instead of your friends list
data.expected_result: Connection should resume and taken you to your friends list
data.short_description: The home page for discordapp.com will show up mid connecting if you refresh Discord via Ctrl+R.
data.steps_to_repro: - Log into Discord - When the "Connecting..." screen pops up, quickly Ctrl+R to refresh Discord - Observe
